amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
